title: How to make Dhikr / Tasbih on Fingertips? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: says could you please tell me how to do tasbih on fingertips according to the sunnah the sunnah did not tell us how to do that so some people would do this on the three parts of the finger the pinky three parts subhan allah subhanlah subhanlah subhan allah subhanallah subhanallah and some would just do it normally subhanallah subhanallah subhan allah these are five and you can do whatever you feel comfortable with without any problem insha'allah you
